titles.title: Air Force Technical Training Enhancement Act
Air Force Technical Training Enhancement Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to establish an Air Force Technical Training Center of Excellence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Air Force Technical Training Enhancement Act
This bill requires the Department of the Air Force to operate a Technical Training Center of Excellence. Among other duties, the center must (1) facilitate collaboration among all Air Force technical training installations; and (2) identify and promulgate best practices, standards, and benchmarks.
